Content: Thank you for the time to contact us and for your interest in our Doral products and promotions. We have made arrangements to send you the Doral and Company free carton order form which you requested. The form will be mailed under separate cover and you should receive it within weeks. In the meantime, if we can be of service to you, please call our toll-free number located on your cigarette pack. One of our representatives will be happy to assist you. Again, Mr. Deberty, we appreciate your time to contact us. Best wishes from all.
Warnings: SURGEON GENERAL'S WARNING: Smoking by Pregnant Women May Result in Fetal Premature Birth, And Low Birth Weight
